alert.note: Alert for Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 25 at 4:43AM AKST until December 26 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow occurring, with freezing rain expected. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches, with localized amounts up to 13 inches, and ice accumulations between one tenth to two tenths of an inch are expected. * WHERE...Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys. * WHEN...Until 9 PM Sunday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Look for significant reductions in visibility at times. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice are occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.

area.areaDesc: Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys
